Story:
A leading beauty brand needed to collect comprehensive Instagram profile data for influencer verification. They required raw profile information, post data, and engagement metrics to make informed decisions about potential partnerships.

The brand partnered with Iceberg Data to implement a comprehensive Instagram profile scraping system. Our solution collected profile metadata, recent posts, engagement metrics, and basic profile information from target influencer accounts.

The system successfully scraped 4 influencer profiles, collecting 187 posts with complete engagement data. Each profile included follower counts, verification status, bio information, and recent post performance metrics.

Within 45 seconds, the brand had access to comprehensive raw data from all target profiles, enabling them to make data-driven decisions about influencer partnerships based on actual performance metrics rather than estimates.
